issue.title: [R] Update fs.Rmd (Working with S3) vignette
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13400](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13400). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Proposed changes:
 \* "we" -> "you"
 \* "See the help for `FileSystem`" -> "See `help(FileSystem)"`
 \* Bullet points in "authentication" section for the parameters
- Any other obvious improvements or updates based on new functionality

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13400?focusedCommentId=17446647) by Jonathan Keane (jonkeane):*
